# Derivatives

| $\frac{d}{dx} e^x = e^x$                      | $\frac{d}{dx} sin(x) = cos(x)$      | $\frac{d}{dx}sec(x) = sec(x)tan(x)$                 | $\frac{d}{dx}tan^{-1}(x) = \frac{1}{1+x^{2}}$           | $\frac{d}{dx}$ |
|-----------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------|-----------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------|----------------|
| $\frac{d}{dx} a^x = a^x (ln(a))$              | $\frac{d}{dx} cos(x) = -sin(x)$     | $\frac{d}{dx}csc(x) = -cot(x)csc(x)$                | $\frac{d}{dx}cot^{-1}(x) = \frac{-1}{1+x^2}$            | $\frac{d}{dx}$ |
| $\frac{d}{dx} ln(x) = \frac{1}{x}$            | $\frac{d}{dx} tan(x) = sec^{2}(x)$  | $\frac{d}{dx}sin^{-1}(x) = \frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^2}}$  | $\frac{d}{dx}sec^{-1}(x) = \frac{1}{x \sqrt{x^2-1}}$    | $\frac{d}{dx}$ |
| $\frac{d}{dx} log_{a}(x) = \frac{1}{x ln(a)}$ | $\frac{d}{dx} cot(x) = -csc^{2}(x)$ | $\frac{d}{dx}cos^{-1}(x) = -\frac{1}{\sqrt{1-x^2}}$ | $\frac{d}{dx}csc^{-1}(x) = -\frac{1}{x \sqrt{x^{2}-1}}$ | $\frac{d}{dx}$ |
